potionparticlepack.midnightconfig.title: Potion Particle Pack
potionparticlepack.midnightconfig.enable:
Each status effect will show their own particles,
instead of merging into one color.
potionparticlepack.midnightconfig.hidePa: Hide your own particles when you are in first person view.
potionparticlepack.midnightconfig.effect: When should Effect Icons display over their items.
